attributes.action: Get rid of Islam in the British Isles
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We would like to see an immediate end and practice of Islam with in the Britsh Isles. As this would open up so many oppertunities for our Country if you have any queries please feel free to contact me at t1993jordan@live.co.uk

This will help our country's economy because some Muslims will not give up their religion, so they will be sent to an Islamic country which will free up jobs. Terrorism will dramaticaly decrease. 

If this petition gets passed you will have helped save lives and helped keep Britian British. Please help me help everyone! The time to act is now before it is too late. Do you want your country ruled by Muslims?

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
